WHO ARE THE TRAFFICKERS?

The media occasionally talks about the issue, but they never provide an honest analysis.


There are organizations that claim to be exposing the slave trade, but all of them are like the 9/11 and the Holocaust groups; they all minimize or ignore the Jewish involvement.

Immigration and slavery are related

Americans believe that a fence along the Mexican border will stop illegal immigration, but Americans are using the poor people as a cheap source of labor, and no fence can stop American citizens from behaving in a selfish manner. 


My advice is investigate and be suspicious of all of these organizations. For example, who are the people running humantrafficking.com? And be suspicious of the television shows that claim to investigate crimes. They lie about 9/11 and other crimes, so why should we trust them? 




              Eric Hufschmid... Avoiding Zionist Tricks And Traps Since 2002.
